name: Balloon Popper (Roulette)
description:
Directions: 

1. Connect with your friends through Parsec and enable Keyboard Input.

2. (Optional) Have a discord call to know who's turn it is.

3. Press 'Z' and 'X' or click the chibi dude to pump the balloon.

4. Keep pumping, and good luck!

Info:

Inspired by Episode 12, Season 1 of Kaguya-sama: Love is war. 

Music Used:

Blue Wednesday - New Shoes

Cold Youth - Nearby

ibrahim - bullet train(ft.luvbird)

Devlog:

- Knownbugs - 

> Music overlaps when choose YES option

> Balloon doesn't show inflate animation when using mouse

> 'Z' key increase balloon by 2, whereas 'X' key doesn't

> Pressing 2 keys at the same time, instead of alternating breaks the game. Applies for both mouse and keyboard.

*Game is only made for fun, and non-profit. Uses copyright music!
